title: SOLD: (4) RARE 1879-80 New York Clipper Baseball Hall of Fame Rookies Woodcuts
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: (4) RARE 1879-80 New York Clipper Baseball Hall of Fame Rookies Woodcuts
posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a group of (4) - 1879-80 New York Clipper Woodcuts, each picturing a Rookie image of a Baseball Hall of Famer. Each woodcut has been authenticated and encapsulated by Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Here is a list of the 4 woodcuts available along with individual prices for each:

Tim Keefe @ $SOLD

Roger Connor @ $SOLD

John Ward @ $SOLD

Dan Brouthers @ $SOLD

Please review scans of the woodcuts for condition details as each piece contains not only the woodcut but also the player bio underneath it. The first person to e-mail me on each and say "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
